property.name: Traits
property.value: Bannerman. Lord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +3 STR during power challenges for each Bannerman character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a card is discarded from a player's hand, kneel Brightwater Keep to return that card to its owner's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments

property.name: Traits
property.value: Siege. Tactic.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Put a Baratheon character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, discard it.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bannerman. Lord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to choose and kneel X locations. X is the number of Bannerman characters you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: The player with the most total cards at his or her command at the beginning of the draw phase draws 1 less card (to a minimum of 1) when he or she draws cards for that phase.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No Attachments

property.name: Traits
property.value: Siege. Item.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a location. While attached location is knelt, its controller cannot declare defenders during Military challenges.

property.value: Bannerman. Lord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +3 STR during Intrigue challenges for each Bannerman character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to add 1 gold token to your gold pool. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Siege. Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Discard Trebuchet from play to give each of your participating characters +X STR until the end of the challenge. X is the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bannerman. House Dayne.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to choose X characters. Until the end of the phase, those characters gain, 'immune to events.' X is the number of Bannerman characters you control.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Stronghold. House Dayne.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to stand Southron Stronghold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a location. Response: After attached location's effect is triggered, return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bannerman. House Umber.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR for each Bannerman character you control

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Northland Keep to choose a particpating character with a higher STR than printed cost. Remove that character from the challenge.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Siege. Tactic.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark Only. Limited Response: After you win a Military challenge, choose and kill any number of characters with a higher STR than printed cost that are controlled by the losing opponent. (Limit 1 limited response per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bannerman. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Discard a card from your hand to put an attachment of cost X or lower into play from your hand. X is the number of Bannerman characters you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of the standing phase, claim 1 power for your House if you control more attachments than each opponent.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to plot card effects

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you control at least 1 printed Dragon character. Challenges: Discard all attachment cards from play. Then, discard the top card of your deck for each attachment discarded by this effect.

property.name: House
property.value: Baratheon. Greyjoy.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Siege. Tactic.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon or Greyjoy only. Dominance: Kneel 3 influence or pay 3 gold to discard all kneeling characters from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose and discard 1 character or location with cost X or lower controlled by the player with the most total cards at his or her command. X is the combined number of plots in all players' used piles.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bannerman. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ser Imry Florent cannot be returned to your hand. If it is Summer or Winter, Ser Imry Florent gets +2 and gains deadly.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. House Tyrell.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Summer, kneel Ser Garlan Tyrell and discard all power from him.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Renown. Deadly.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The North.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win a challenge, kneel all copies of The Kingsroad in play to choose an opponent. Then, if it is Winter, that player must discard 1 card at random from his or her hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Ironborn.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. If it is Winter, each of your characters get +2 STR while you control more locations than each opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is not Summer, Longship Great Kraken gains, 'Dominance: Each opponent must discard the top X cards of his or her deck, where X is the number of characters in his or her dead pile. (Limit once per round)'

property.name: Text
property.value: If you control more locations than each opponent, Damphair's Drowned gets +1 STR and gains an INT icon with a NAVAL enhancement.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a MIL challenge in which King's Landing Guard participated, discard 1 card at random from the losing player's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King. Lord.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Lannister only. Any Phase: If it is Summer, kneel Tommen Baratheon to look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Switch any 1 of those cards with a card in your hand, if able. Then, put the remaining cards on top of your deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win a challenge, kneel all copies of The Kingsroad in play. Then, if it is Summer, draw 1 card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lady. Bastard.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. While it is Summer, Ellaria Sand gains: 'Response: After an opponent plays or puts a character into play, Ellaria Sand claims 2 power if that player controls more characters than you. (Limit 3 times per phase.)'

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bannerman. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Any Phase: If it is Summer, discard Operyn's Shield Bearer (cannot be saved) to cancel the next 3 effects triggered by a single opponent (of your choice) this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Response: After you have lost your third challenge in the same phase, bring The Long Plan out of Shadows by paying the rest of its gold cost. Then, claim 3 power for your House (Limit 1 per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Skinchanger. Lord.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Winter, Bran Stark gains, 'Challenges: During a challenge, kneel Bran Stark to choose and kneel a standing, non-participating, non-Army character with higher STR than printed cost. That character is now participating in the current challenge on your side.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Challenges: If it is Winter, kneel Winterfell to increase the claim of the current challenge by 1.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: If you are running a Seasons agenda, search your deck for a non-Raven card with either the work 'Summer' or 'Winter' in its text box, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Dothraki.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. If it is summer, each of your characters gets +2 STR, while you control more attachments than each opponent.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The East.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: If it is Summer, after you win a POW challenge, kneel Slaver's Bay to put a non-unique character from any opponent's discard pile into play under your control.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bannerman. Dothraki.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Dothraki Vanguard from your hand, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. You may put 1 revealed Dothraki character into play. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: If no opponent is running a Seasons agenda, it cannot be Winter. If it is Summer, increase each player's draw cap by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: If no opponent is running a Seasons agenda, it cannot be Summer. If it is Winter, each player must choose and discard down to 4 cards in hand at the end of the dominance phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Shadow Killer comes out of shadows, choose and kill a character controlled by a player with more total cards at his or her command than you (Cannot be saved).

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only. Stealth. Deadly.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lady. Asshai.

property.name: Text
property.value: Holy characters in your dead pile count their STR for dominance. Response: After you win dominance, choose a Holy character in your dead pile and put it into play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bannerman. Lord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard Greydon Goodbrother from play (cannot be saved) if you control fewer locations than any opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win an unopposed challenge, return Longship Grey Ghost to shadows. Response: After Longship Grey Ghost comes out of shadows, choose a character. That character cannot defend this phase.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy Only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tywin Lannister does not kneel to attack an opponent with more cards in hand than you.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Hound gets +1 STR for each card in shadows.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Arianne Martell comes out of shadows, choose and reveal a new plot card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Coldhands cannot be saved. Response: After you play Coldhands from your hand, choose 1 non-Army character controlled by each player, if able, and remove those characters from the game. When Coldhands leaves play, return the removed cards to play under their owner's control.

property.value: Lord. King.

property.value: Ally characters cannot be declared as defenders while Viper's Paramour is attacking.

property.value: If it is not Summer, Yoren can defend Intrigue challenges declared against you, even while kneeling.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Challenges: Discard the top card of your deck to give attached character +1 STR until the end of the phase. (Limit 5 per round).

property.name: Text
property.value: When Eastwatch Envoy gains an icon, it also gains a Naval enhancement with that icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Ygritte from your hand, choose and take control of a neutral or Night's Watch character until Ygritte leaves play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Increase the size of your plot deck by 1. (Limit 1 per plot deck). When revealed, choose and reveal a new plot card if you control 2 or more Night's Watch or Wildling characters. (Cannot be canceled).

property.value: When revealed, the player with the most cards at his or her command must choose and discard 2 cards that are under his or her command.

property.value: If any opponent has more power on his or her House card than you, Asha Greyjoy cannot be killed

property.value: Obara Sand gets +2 STR and gains renown while she is attacking a player who controls more characters than you.

property.value: Discard attached character from play (cannot be saved) when you kneel Doran's Favor to pay an influence cost.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Setup. Attach to a character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Any Phase: Choose any number of influence providing cards with combined printed cost 3 or lower. Kneel all chosen cards or stand all chosen cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Robb Stark participated, choose and kill a character with a higher STR than its printed cost. (Cannot be saved)

property.name: Text
property.value: While any opponent's House card has more power than your House card, Harwin gains, 'Response: After you win a Military challenge, search your deck for a card, shuffle your deck, and then put that card on top of your deck.'

property.name: Traits
property.value: Stronghold. Stormlands.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. While any opponent's House card has more power than your House card, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 during Power challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Attached character gets +3 STR, gains the Bannerman trait, and gains a Military, an Intrigue, and a Power icon. After you lose a Power challenge, discard attached character from play. (Cannot be saved.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Brotherhood. Ally. Bastard.

property.name: Text
property.value: While any opponent's House card has more power than your House card, Gendry gains, 'Response: After you win a challenge in which Gendry participated, move 1 power from the losing player's House card to Gendry'

property.name: Text
property.value: While any opponent's House card has more power than your House card, Lady of the Leaves gains, 'Any Phase: Kneel Lady of the Leaves to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as if its printed text box were blank.'

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to events.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon only. You draw 1 less card during the draw phase (to a minimum of 1). Your Baratheon characters with printed cost 2 or higher gain renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. After a challenge resolves, the player who counted the lowest total STR must choose and kill a participating character he or she controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, the player with the fewest cards at his or her command adds 4 gold to his or her gold pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Maester Cressen comes out of shadows or after he is killed, return the topmost card of your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tyrell. Lord.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is not Summer, reduce the amount of power required for each player to win the game by 1 for each power on Mace Tyrell.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Draw 4 cards, ignoring the draw cap. You cannot draw cards for the rest of the game.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you control more locations than each opponent, Gran Goodbrother cannot be killed or discarded from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: During a challenge, kneel Longship Mainden's Bane to have it participate in the current challenge on your side as a character with 'cannot be killed' and X STR. X is the number of Warship cards you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Any Phase: Discard a Warship location from play or from your hand to give attached character +4 STR and deadly until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Grand Maester Pycelle participated, discard up to 2 cards at random from the losing opponent's hand. Then, that player adds that same number of cards from the top of his deck to his hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Any Phase: Discard attached character from play to add 4 gold tokens to your gold pool from the treasury.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: During an INT challenge, kneel 2 of your Lannister characters to kill all attacking characters. Limit 1 per challenge.

property.value: Southron Heiress gains stealth and deadly when attacking a player who controls more characters than you.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Stealth. Immune to opponent's events.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are not running an agenda, Allerase gains: Response: After an opponent running an agenda wins a challenge as the attacker against you, name a challenge type. That player cannot declare attackers or defenders during that challenge type until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Sansa Stark from your hand, search your deck for a card. If you have the fewest cards at your command, add it to your hand. Otherwise, discard it. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Stark character you control. Limit 1 per character. While the attached character is attacking alone, increase the claim value on your revealed plot card by 2. If you win the challenge, discard attached character from play (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
